name: Concrete Sky
description:
Concrete Sky - is an adventure set in a post-war USSR. Global nuclear conflict ended a few years ago, making surface of the Earth uninhabitable. Few survivors are struggling for their lives under the ground, making occasional forays to the surface.
You play as a Soviet neuroscientist who was engaged in research of new implants that would have enhanced the brain activity and efficiency of a human. Obviously, this research interested both US and USSR military. Thus, in pursuit of the superhuman, US and USSR did not concede their ambitions, even though the war led to the destruction of the entire world. The Gods will not hear the prayers of these people. Concrete sky covered them with its gloomy pall forevermore...
Take the side of one of the parties and bring it to an end or go against everyone and get it over with. In any case, the choice is yours.
Every decision affects the game and how it will develop.
Unleash your hero by interacting with a variety of characters in any way you want.
